DOC.detailed_description: Portion-controlled meal replacement show effective weight control strategy overweight obese individual . The addition medical supervision show result great weight loss meal replacement alone . MWCC provide added support individual weekly counseling session . Thus , investigator plan retrospectively evaluate efficacy MWCC Jump Start ( Medifast 's 5 & 1 ) Plan follow index : weight loss , anthropometric change , reduction common marker coronary heart disease .
